Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Truly a GREAT bar in the core of the downtown Amsterdam area. Happy staff always manage to turn a good place into an awesome place. Loved it so much I went back a few times and got a T-shirt for fun too! During soccer matches expect and heck of an great atmosphere here.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar, friendly and happy barkeeper's. Convenient location. Totally recommend to stop by there

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Busy place in the red light district of Amsterdam, hardly a chance to get a place. A little bit more expensive, maybe because it is a touristic place. Great choice of beers!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar, iconic location, good beer üçª

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Every time I travel to Amsterdam I stop to the Old Sailor. The bar is located in a perfect spot in the Red Light District. The atmosphere is perfect.
It does have a pretty good selection of beers on tap. The servers are friendly ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Well situated pub in the red light district. Sit on the outside area and watch the late show from across the road. Always festive, always packed and always a good time! Loads of beers to choose from! Great vibe!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Such a cool place to relax for a bit and get something to drink. The bartender is soo welcoming and the greatest I have ever met.
Definitely worth a visit!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam for pre-drinks! Love it

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Good beer on tap, alongside the canal. Relaxing vibe.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Old style English pub, little bit expensive but still good to visit and have beer or so, very buys all so, very nice staff funny people. ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: one of the best pubs in Amsterdam in Redsreets

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Awesome place to grab a drink!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Awesome place. Nice people. Probably the best pub in the city.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice to drink something and meet some people.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Come across this bar on the corner and what a great pub it is. Great pints of Amstel and amazing music. It has the feel of a proper pub. Great atmosphere with everyone drinking pints with the pub landlord singing away with smile on his face serving the customers with quality drinks. Reccomend to everyone.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great pub for some beers in daytime as well as at night. Good music. Nice bartenders. Only thing that is negative is that the place is small, as well as the bathroom

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice pub, great service and great bartenders. Bathrooms are gross but free, I've seen worse in this area. Sports playing on the TV and nice atmosphere.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Quaint pub in Amsterdam.  Friendly atmosphere, good tunes and happy people.  Nice spot to relax for a few.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: A lovely bar, friendly staff and a great selection of lagers, beer and other drinks.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Friendly atmosphere, nice staff and nice beer with outdoor seating available.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Caf√© Old Sailor is perfectly located in red light district. Lovely and lively atmosphere, reasonable prices

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice bar. One of my favourites in Amsterdam. Sure, it is in the center of touristic district, but still a nice one.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: You can talk football with Ajax fans over a good beer, ideal on match days!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar..had a good time

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Well known pub in the Red Light district, not only visited by tourists...

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Very cool place, wonderful music,  beer and service

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice quiet pub by the canal in the middle of the red light district

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: It's really very quatly pub very good

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: A pub with quirky decor. Has Amstel on tap. A bit on the more expensive side but great location.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Loved it. Great service and drinks

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Extremely friendly bar.  As Americans, we had a lot of good times and we were able to communicate with staff without issue.  The bartenders were fun, engaging and just fun to be around.  This is one of the best bars in Amsterdam to attend. ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great pub in the heart of the red light area

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Very nice place for a beer with some friends! Good prices and good service! And of course amazing view!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Fantastic atmosphere and good drinks in the heart of the Red Light District.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Must visit this pub. Great atmosphere good choice of drinks staff are polite and professional, excellent place to visit. Football on TV, music is on and good views depending where you look üò≥üòÇ. Definitely recommend that you visit here even if you only have 5 hours in Amsterdam.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: My favourite pub in all of Amsterdam, location, atmosphere and the old feel about the place is lovely. Seating is limited but I don't mind standing. Only downfall is the the Gary glitter as there isn't one and you have to take a wee in a big sink you stand in and soak your brothel sneakers.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Itsa really cool bar in a nice location in the red light district.  They have a variety of music from classic songs to modern hits.  They also play sports games.  There is a good beer selection.  The bathrooms are a little odd and it can get super packed.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Can't really remember a lot of the night I was in there but as my intention was to go in and do exactly that I guess its good! from what I can remember the atmosphere was great with lots of singing and the bar staff where really friendly to ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice place during day and night! Friendly and funny staff and great views

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Visited this area for the first time, the bartender KEN was incredible! Gave us lots of useful information on where to go, was great to our group! The beer was awesome, shots were fun and can‚Äôt wait to someday to back, GREAT EXPERIENCE! MADE OUR TRIP!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Ok selection of beer, can be a bit busy but with a good vibe

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: This place is always packed on weekends, it's an interesting bar with cool decor. It can get a bit rowdy, most of the patrons are generally pretty drunk. Skip it if you want a more relaxed setting, but if you're in the mood to get loud and drunk, check it out!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Friendly relaxed atmosphere "beltin" üëçüëç

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Love this place. The staff are really welcoming and a good laugh. Brilliant place to site and people watch and get a real idea of what goes on in Amsterdam. We will definitely be back again.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar in a great location. Loses a star because of the men's room has no where to eliminate. The drink, although plentiful is a little on the expensive. Feels like you're paying a euro more on everything. The bar itself has a great vibe ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Surely, is a nice place to chill out!

Great beer and snacks, loud chatting around, interesting view of the "red light ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Very cool atmosphere. I stopped in to have a drink before heading to the airport to catch my flight. It was about 1p and the place was pretty packed.Only accepts cash so I had to find an ATM since I had only used my credit card for all purchases until that point.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Decent pub in Amsterdam. Definitely worth a visit. Decor is from old sea going days and is pretty interesting. Standard priced drinks. Wouldn't sit here all night but stop in for a pint.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Fine place to spend a time with sailors. So much environment and vibe like being on a oldy pub with Amsterdam's best beers.
Literally must to vist once in AMS

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Really busy bar and with good reason it serves one of the best pints of beer in amsterdam. For me the problem is the toilet. There is only one, a hole in the ground and no matter what time of day there is always a que outside it.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Good place for a bevo or 6 in the red light area.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Legendary bar, very nice atmosphere, good beer

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Best bar in the Dam. I go to Amsterdam every couple of years with work and the old sailor is always first on the visit list! Great atmosphere, proper Amstel on tap and always busy! Makes for a good place to have a few beers

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Had my phone stolen there a week ago. Not much of an assistance from staff, seemed very indifferent, like it's a casual thing there. Be careful.
Apart from that, very crowded, beer was ok, though overpriced.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: A nice little bar in the middle of the crazy town. Loved the vibe and the staff. Good beer in that electric atmosphere. Of course, the washroom was disgusting and the line up long.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Incredible place... So easy to reach it. The beer is awesome, they have one type of weissbier omg is so tasty ‚ô°‚ô°‚ô° people there are so sweet and really nice, i hope you can go to Old Sailor when you travel to amsterdam!! üòäüòäüòä

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Me and the GF went here for somewhere to drink and ended up coming back for the other 2 nights we were in Amsterdam. Has really cool d√©cor and a great vibe. Prices are not too bad.
Will be visiting again

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Very packed and hot inside, cash only for drinks... closest cash machine charges a transaction fee so not really an option if only want a few drinks, much better bars in the area

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Crowded and busy locals hangout. Beware sitting at the bar, service is very splashy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice to see Popeyes reopened

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text:
Honestly an amazing place, the bartenders were so nice and chatty, really fun.
Great atmosphere, would def love to go there again.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: One of my favorite bars when in Amsterdam! Good prices, great music, and even better atmosphere. Always have a good time here.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Cool pub with a maritime theme. A place to have a pint and watch the world go by in Amsterdam's red light district. Expensive and really packed, however.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great place but the price of Amstel went up as it got later in the evening. Its a must visit to see the gents toilets. This is why we need to leave the EU.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Bartenders apply soap to the glass but thet don't rinse it than they serve beer in it.I was really suprised about this watch them in astonishment :) otherwise place is nice and good location

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Ken the barman looked after us for a few hours, just watching him at his job made me feel tired, the man never stops!! Great bar and atmosphere, well worth a visit..

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Excellent pub !!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: The worst cafe ever, poor management‚Äôs behavior. The owner/manager ‚Äúshouted‚Äù on me and ‚Äúhumiliated‚Äù me on public because I took my beer to sit and drink it outside!

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Good beer. Nice place.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Be sure to visit this place,its great

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: They dont have a menu so u dont know about the rates. Decent music better than other places. No titbits. Location is good.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice and cozy caf√© where you can walk into and talk to al types of people. It has a nice view at the bussy street. The beer is excellent.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Allong the years many things change, even attitudes and purpose. But like the name say's The Old Sailor was one of the traditional sailor cafe's at the Amsterdam Red Light district. Now these days the bar crew is much entertaining folks ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: A fantastic place to absorb the bustle and bustle of the Red Light District and to people watch. There is a good selection of beers available here and the staff are friendly and knowledgeable about the beverages.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Authentic spot in Amsterdam right in the Red Light District. Great for a half pint of Amstel and some people watching. Get a spot outside at dusk for optimal people watching.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Staff were entertaining. Decent beer selection. Small but packed. Must be doing something right. DO NOT go here for the restrooms. Ha.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great venue with friendly and energetic atmosphere.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great atmosphere.  Get a window seat and watch the world of Amsterdam go by. The gents toilet is an experience you'll never forgot ü§£

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Of course a lot of tourists, but it does resemble an old fashioned Dutch bar. Friendly staff and nice atmosphere.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Cool place. Amsterdam was a great trip.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Go to place for a nice beer in the red light district. Fair prices for Amsterdam city center and good atmosphere. Could be a little crowded at times.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar and fantastic pint , great staff and great views üòÇüòÇüòÇ can‚Äôt wait to go back again later in the year ,,

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Sailed out to spend time in Amsterdam, we always call in to have a drink or two and soak up the atmosphere.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: It's a very good bar. The location is perfect, exactly on the main canal. It's very funny there. We are watching football games there also.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Very friendly staff, always full with people. Nice place to sit outside and watch people walking by. Excellent place next to the river.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Great bar, good beer and super friendly staff

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Nice pub, happu atmosphere and good music.  Easy going place to relax for a few right in the heart of Amsterdam.

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: WHAT A NIGHT, IT'S LIKE THE UNITED NATIONS, WE WERE SAT WITH A COUPLE FROM MANCHESTER AND A COUPLE FROM CONNETTICUT, NONE OF US HAD EVER MET BEFORE AND WILL PROBABLY NEVER MEET AGAIN WE WERE BEST OF FRIENDS FOR THE 2-3 HOURS THAT WE WERE ‚Ä¶

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Man I had good time drinking with people all over world , Cool women in there parting with us, bartendes great thanks,hope to come back....cowboy_

Name: Old Sailor
Review Text: Fun bar in the Red Light district!
